projects: [{"title":"Designed A System Architecture to launch Velocity Test Drive service.","start_date":"Aug 2020","end_date":"Present","description":"•Adding a Complex Structure to Modular architecture to design self actionable Screens in Android application.•Creating a dynamic and interactive screens in Android application with predefined events and actions like on-change, hide and shows on screen elements, created/managed from backend panels.•Just with the panel’s can make change in any screen or flow in Android Application with out launched a Play store build reducing workload andincreasing Re usability."},{"title":"Modular architecture to create any serviceable products","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Oct 2020","description":"•Created and developed a new System Deigned to launch any services as quick as possible.•Flexible to change any existing services from root level to leaf node with just panels in business logic to reduce70% of work load to developer.•Created an entire Droom velocity test drive product with this architecture in 2 weeks accounting the productivity gain to nearly 400 %."},{"title":"Run-time Diagnostics of Vehicle using Socket Communication","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Apr 2020","description":"•Launched a Product To track and maintain trips as well the vehicle health in run time for Fleet owners.•Created a TCP connection to the VEHICLE CAN BUS to accusation of vehicle Ecus sensor data in its raw form to diagnose.•Maintained a Enterprise panel to track vehicle as well the previous trips to reduce fraud in business of fleet owners increase productivity."},{"title":"Certification for the health of the inspected vehicle ","start_date":"Aug 2019","end_date":"Nov 2019","description":"Decoded and Calculated the parameters of the vehicle such as fuel economy, power , torque, battery voltage and MAF etc to certify the health of the vehicle Where the data received by ECU sensors of the vehicle through teltonika OBD device with a 7 mints test drive.Used the networking techniques to decode buffer hex data and automated the entire process for multiple inspections with rabbitmq queuing in PHP laravel."}]
